text: (patru porkkalattil) cantitta iru cenaikalil meyyakave unkalukku or attatci iruntatu. (Onru) allahvin pataiyil por puriyum kuttam, marroru kuttattinar nirakarippavarkal. (Nirakarippavarkal akiya) ivarkal allahvin pataiyil por puripavarkalai tankalaivita iru matankaka(t tankal) kannal kantanar. Allah, tan virumpiyavarkalait tan utaviyaik kontu (ivvaru) palappatuttukiran. (Patippinai perum) parvaiyutaiyavarkalukku niccayamaka itil oru (nalla) patippinai irukkiratu
